title: Calories in Sweet Frog Frozen Yogurt
meta_description: Discover calories in sweet frog frozen yogurt per serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition breakdowns for popular flavors and tweaks.
h1: Calories in Sweet Frog Frozen Yogurt
assumptions: Plain or vanilla frozen yogurt; standard mix-ins not included; values based on typical nutritional profiles for the brand.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, toppings, portion size, and preparation; check Sweet Frog's official labels or app for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of Sweet Frog frozen yogurt contains about 130 kcal and 24 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp granola topping per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in sweet frog per 100 g?
faqs.a: Approximately 130 kcal for plain or vanilla Sweet Frog frozen yogurt.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Sweet Frog frozen yogurt?
faqs.a: About 24 g carbs per 100 g, mostly from sugars.

faqs.q: Does Sweet Frog have low-calorie options?
faqs.a: Yes, non-fat or low-fat flavors can be under 100 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: How do toppings affect calories in sweet frog?
faqs.a: Toppings like candy or nuts can add 50-100 kcal per serving.

faqs.q: Is Sweet Frog frozen yogurt healthier than ice cream?
faqs.a: Often yes, with lower fat (3 g vs. 7 g per 100 g) but similar calories.
